data.title: What time zone is Salamanca, New York?
data.meta_description: What time zone is Salamanca, New York? Get facts and information about the time zone in Salamanca, New York
data.text:
Salamanca, New York is located in the Eastern Time Zone, which means that the time is Eastern Standard Time (EST) during regular time and Eastern Daylight Time (EDT) when daylight savings is in effect.

Eastern Standard Time

When it is Eastern Standard Time, Salamanca, New York is UTC-05:00 which means that it is -5 hours offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

The Eastern Standard Time in Salamanca, New York (UTC-05:00) is shown in blue below:

Eastern Daylight Time

When it is Eastern Daylight Time, Salamanca, New York will be UTC-04:00 which means that it is -4 hours offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and the time will be as follows in green:

As you can see, the difference between EST and EDT in Salamanca, New York is one hour, because the daylight savings is adjusted by one hour.
